Author: NovexTeam
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP][ICO] Novex - The All-In-One Blockchain Payment Solution <<<<<<<<<
Body: NOVEX Introducing The All-In-One Blockchain Payment Solution  Thread design: https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/H0a6s4h.png   Click here to join second airdrop   Novex team wishes you a happy new year! Our ICO starts today (1 january) and you can now participate in the Novex project!     What is Novex?  Novex is an Open-Source Decentralized Payment solution using an Ethereum based, ERC-20 token. The majority of the merchants and people do not use cryptocurrency as a payment method and there are four main reasons for that: Complexity, Risk, Rates and fees and adoption. While these issues might seem to be a minor inconvenience, they do in fact keep us from making the next step. Novex offers the solution to all the problems listed.   We introduce Novex as the solution to all the problems we have with online cryptocurrency payments. To start things off, the Novex developers work hard to create the Novex App. This is going to be an open-source app that is simple to use by everybody. There is no need for any previous experience with cryptocurrencies what will increase the adoption of cryptocurrencies. While working on the app, the team will also start developing an open-source decentralized marketplace where the community can buy and sell goods to each other. This is decentralized so there is no interference from any instance, including the Novex team. We are also in negotiation with various merchants to use Novex as one of the available payment methods online by developing an open-source easy-to-use API that can be used by every business.  There is a lot more we want to tell you but this thread is not enough. We kindly advice you to take a look at our whitepaper located on our website.     Roadmap   Q1 2018 - Listing on Exchanges - Hiring new developers - Marketing & Bounty program start - Mobile App Release  Q2 2018 - Novex Payment API release for businesses - Novex Marketplace BETA  Q3 2018 - Fully released Marketplace - Starting new marketing program  Future - Offering one of the best decentralized payment solution with a fully decentralized marketplace.        Token Details   Contract Address: 0x510E7770Be2d7d6D043Bb2Fa65715505b0F2D2Ff Token Symbol: NEX Decimals: 18 Min Token Supply: 500.000 Max Token Supply: 1.000.000     Crowdsale  Don't miss your chance to be a part of the greatest cryptocurrency payment solution of the future.  Price of Tokens  Tier 1 crowdsale (01 jan – 04 jan) = 7000 NEX tokens per 1 ETH Tier 2 crowdsale (04 jan – 11 jan) =  5500 NEX tokens per 1 ETH Tier 3 crowdsale (12 jan – 19 jan) =  5250 NEX tokens per 1 ETH Tier 4 crowdsale (20 jan – 28 jan) = 5000 NEX tokens per 1 ETH  SOFT CAP: 100.000 NEX tokens HARD CAP: 600.000 NEX tokens  Crowdsale ends on 28 January 2018.  Send your Ethereum to the address below  0x1906130a5B667316846BB36F05fc2B8d4D0Bcab0  The NEX tokens will be sent after 10 Ethereum confirmations. Minimum contribution is 0.1 ETH.   28,840 of the 100,000 softcap tokens are sold      Airdrop  You can also participate in the Airdrop to obtain NEX tokens. We have a total of 100.000 NEX tokens allocated for the airdrop.  REQUIREMENTS: 1. Follow us on Twitter and retweet our pinned post. 2. Join our Telegram group.  50.000 NEX Tokens for 1000 people in round 1 (1 January 2018, 4:00 GMT -5) 25.000 NEX Tokens for 600 people in round 2 (8 January 2018, time posted later) 25.000 NEX Tokens for 800 people in round 3 (14 January 2018, time posted later)  We will be posting a google form. Every round there is a maximum amount of slots. When this is reached you have to wait for the next round to join. You can only join one airdrop.  Participants will receive the airdropped tokens right after finishing our ICO!       Exchanges  Hitbtc Bitafex Etherdelta (only if they update their security + iu)     Bounties  There is a total of 200.000 tokens allocated for Bounties.  Thread Translation bounty (200 NEX)  Chinese - (Available) Japanese - (Available) Russian - (Available) French Arabic - (Available) Turkish - (Available) German Dutch Polish - (Available) Filipino Italian - (Available)  Please contact one of the team members via telegram for translation. More bounties are soon to come.     Information   Website: https://www.novex.io Telegram: https://www.t.me/novextoken Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/novexteam

Author: blok
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP][ICO] Novex - The All-In-One Blockchain Payment Solution <<<<<<<<<
Body: An odd project.  First, Ethereum tokens for payment systems is odd... Ethereum by itself is barely able to work as a payments medium, and no ERC token could remedy that.  Second, the sale itself is extremely odd — ~$60k hard cap? What kind of business are you going to build with this? Where are you incorporated?  Also — 200 NEX bounty? Do you mean 200,000 NEX?
